name: Hearts of Gold
description:
Well done! You’ve made it. The dragon is slain and his treasures are yours for the taking.

You have all done your part in this heroic quest but…

...who’s done the most?... who’s entitled to the biggest share?

Suddenly, your noble hearts that, so far, have been focuced solely on defeating the foul beast start turning to the inevitable everyday reality you are soon going to come back to.

The gold looks more and more shiny and enticing with each second…

QUICK!

Grab as much of it as you can and outrun your former companions to the exit!

Make sure you leave with the biggest loot by any means necessary…

The game explores what happens after a typical quest is over, when the beast is dead and greed comes into play.
